column4: is there a way display to display man/info pages in nautilus?
man pages of scary powerful programs look so much more motivating in these konqueror style coloured well formated man pages
there are web pages with man pages, if you want them
there are others but that's what I have bookmarked for these occasions
ohhh, they got a shell tutorial too...
yup - it's a good one: I used bits of it to learn bash
i'm currently using bash only for executing single commands... wanted to go a little into details...
I have  a little timer script I've written here, if you are interested (first attempt at a GUI)
